spec:
1. Verify {{ENTITY}} model exists in schema.prisma
2. Verify {{ENTITY}} has required fields: id (uuid/int), [domain fields]
3. Verify createdAt, updatedAt audit fields exist
4. Verify soft delete fields exist: isDeleted (Boolean default false), deletedAt (DateTime?), deletedBy (String?)
5. Verify appropriate relations are defined
6. Verify indexes exist on frequently queried fields
7. Verify migration applies without errors
